page.title: 04THE NORFOLK SHOW - 27TH JUNE
page.content: We had breakfast at 8.00, we had Weetabix. We left for the Norfolk Show at 11.00. Me, James, Donna, Dad and Mum went. When we were nearly there, there was a traffic jam at 11.15. We had our lunch in our car. We had cheese rolls, crisps, Penguins and an apple at 11.50. We got there at 12.30. We parked the car at 12.40. We got into the Showground at 12.50. We looked round and then it started to rain at 1.30. It stopped raining at 2.00 p.m. We went into the Main Ring at 4.30 and watched parachuting, horse-jumping and men on motorbikes. When we had finished watching the things in the ring we went back home. It was 7.15 when we got home. We had dinner at home. We had sausages in a roll, Invaders and potatoes. Me, James and Donna went to bed at 10.00 p.m.
